Enrollment Requirements: REASON: Pre-registration is not allowed for this class. Please try again during regular registration.
Add Consent: Department Consent Required
title: SoC SAI 401-0-20 Topics in Sound Production

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The purpose of this seminar is to provide structure and support for students in the Sound Arts and Industries program toward the completion of their Study in Sound. This is accomplished through a participatory format of presentation, discussion, and critique supporting the formulation and incremental refinement of each student's capstone project. This process will culminate in the final presentation of Study in Sound, in whatever format best suits the work accomplished.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: The learning objectives of the course will be determined by each student, as they pertain to their individual goals.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value:
Students will be evaluated on the basis of:

  • their proposal of, and adherence to, a plan of work for the quarter

  • 4-5 presentations over the course of the quarter.

  • participation in class discussion and critiques.

subject: SAI
